img_above_text:
![Wukong LowerHollow 15.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/ff/Wukong_LowerHollow_15.jpg)
Take the far right path past a few pools of water, and you'll be able to head along the right wall past a Grasshopper Guai to find three Puppet Ticks, who will try to slow you down with webbing and summon Stone Spiders. Defeat them all, you you'll gain the Puppet Tick Spirit from the enemy in the middle of the group.
img_below_text:
Return back the way you came and look for a high ledge at the top of this platform. To the right, you'll find a **Treasure Chest** guarded by a lone archer, which holds rare items like a Septenary Heartfire Pill, Knot of Voidness, or Blood of the Iron Bull!
![Wukong LowerHollow 14.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/74/Wukong_LowerHollow_14.jpg)

content.text:

Take the far right path past a few pools of water, and you'll be able to head along the right wall past a Grasshopper Guai to find three Puppet Ticks, who will try to slow you down with webbing and summon Stone Spiders. Defeat them all, you you'll gain the Puppet Tick Spirit from the enemy in the middle of the group."
            - Following Text: "Return back the way you came and look for a high ledge at the top of this platform. To the right, you'll find a **Treasure Chest** guarded by a lone archer, which holds rare items like a Septenary Heartfire Pill, Knot of Voidness, or Blood of the Iron Bull!

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" where the player character is navigating through a rocky, dimly lit area. The character is approaching a high ledge marked by a red circle, which is likely the location of a **Treasure Chest** mentioned in the following text. This chest is guarded by a lone archer and contains rare items such as a Septenary Heartfire Pill, Knot of Voidness, or Blood of the Iron Bull. The preceding text suggests the player has just defeated a group of Puppet Ticks and is now returning to find this treasure.
